name: Sock and a Hard Place
description:
You are a sock who has lost its mate. Repair your pair of socks by Re-pairing with your lost mate. Watch out for the 'Doomba', or it may devour you in its ceaseless quest to clean the floors of waste.

--Requires Controller--
Controls:
Movement - Left stick 
Camera - Right Stick
Jump - Right Trigger

GGJ2020 Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/sock-and-hard-place-8

Credits:
